textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Suggest you post this in the micro four thirds forum. Lots of users with experience over there. As ever it depends on how much you want to spend and your preferences. Generally it seems Panasonic are best for video and they do have some 2.8 zooms on the horizon. What's missing with your FZ150? The answer should help your choice. david May 11, 2012 chalky46, In reply to
